definition: a jade worker/a jade statuette/a beautiful person/(term of endearment)
virtuoso piper wins a beauty/the xiao 箫 (mouth organ) virtuoso 萧史 won for his wife the beautiful daughter of Duke Mu of Qin 秦穆公

sentences.english: The most of crown forms wear by the prehistory jade figures in China are rail crown.
sentences.chinese: 考古所见我国史前玉人的冠式多为纵梁冠。

definition: Baiyü county (Tibetan: dpal yul rdzong) in Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘孜藏族自治州[Gan1 zi1 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Sichuan (formerly in Kham province of Tibet)
sheep-fat white jade, a type of jade
(literary) (of a woman) to have a graceful demeanor/beautiful woman
a beautiful woman/graceful and elegant posture/moon
beauty unmatched in her generation (idiom); woman of peerless elegance/prettiest girl ever
Nichang, abbr. for the Tang Dynasty song "Raiment of Rainbows and Feathers" 霓裳羽衣曲[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 qu1] or 霓裳羽衣舞[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 wu3]
nichang, rainbow colored clothes worn by the Eight Immortals 八仙[Ba1 xian1]
